basic.description: This course covers analysis and design of single- and multi-degree-of- freedom structures subjected to various types of excitations and initial conditions. Topics include computational aspects of dynamic analysis, including approximate methods of analysis, and introduction to earthquake loading and design.
basic.subject: CES
basic.title: Structural Dynamics

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: CES 4101 and MAP 3305 or MAP 2302.
